attributes.action: london olympic village to have its postcode changed
attributes.additional_details:
To honour the success of the london 2012 games and the unimaginable success of TEAM GB with thier epic golds, we would like the olympic village and olympic stadium to have its postcode changed to emulate this years GOLD MEDALS haul, ie:- 30 gold medals the year 2012 ,postcode will be the olympic village London GB30 Y12 (as Great Britian 30 medals year 2012)
This would be a fitting tribute to those atheletes,trainers and the ppl of great britian who made these games one to remember, also this will leave a legacy for those to come to be shown what blood,sweart,passion and PRIDE can do.
Also an honour for those sportsman to feel a great belief that they to where involved when only the top get queens honours MBE,KNIGHTHOODS AND LORDS...
After all we are now bk to known as GREAT BRITIAN !!
